summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5880 for the improvement of West 47th Street, from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 6th Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77445, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
